languages.text: "А мы возвращаемся. Какая уж тут охота, когда добыча даже не пытается трепыхаться в твоей хватке. Одно разочарование!" {n}Каллигос вызывающе ухмыляется.{/n} "Только не думай, {name}, что я забуду все твои слова и обещания. Позже сочтемся".

traits.locale_text: "А мы возвращаемся. Какая уж тут охота, когда добыча даже не пытается трепыхаться в твоей хватке. Одно разочарование!" {n}Каллигос вызывающе ухмыляется.{/n} "Толкьо не думай, {name}, что я забуду все твои слова и обещания. Позже сочтемся".

languages.text: "We shall be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We shall revisit that later."
languages.original_text: "А мы возвращаемся. Какая уж тут охота, когда добыча даже не пытается трепыхаться в твоей хватке. Одно разочарование!" {n}Каллигос вызывающе ухмыляется.{/n} "Только не думай, {name}, что я забуду все твои слова и обещания. Позже сочтемся".

traits.locale_text: "We will be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We will get back to it later."

"We will be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We will get back to it later."

"We will be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We will get back to it later."

"We will be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We will get back to it later."

"We shall be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We shall revisit that later."

"We shall be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We shall revisit that later."

languages.text: «Nos marchamos. ¿Qué clase de cacería es ésta si la presa no se debate entre mis manos? ¡Qué decepción!». {n}Calligos esboza una sonrisa de provocación.{/n} «Y no crea que se me van a olvidar sus palabras y promesas, {name}. Ya retomaremos el asunto más adelante».
languages.original_text: "We shall be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We shall revisit that later."

traits.locale_text: «Nos marchamos. ¿Qué clase de cacería es ésta si la presa no se debate entre mis manos? ¡Qué decepción!». {n}Calligos esboza una sonrisa de provocación.{/n} «Y no crea que se me van a olvidar sus palabras y promesas, {name}. Ya retomaremos el asunto más adelante».

languages.text: “我们要回去了。如果猎物落到你手里，却连挣扎都不会挣扎，那还算什么狩猎？我太失望了！”{n}卡里戈斯脸上闪过了挑衅的笑容。{/n}“还有，别以为我会忘了你的话和你的承诺，{name}，这些事情咱们下次见面再说。”
languages.original_text: "We shall be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We shall revisit that later."

traits.locale_text: “我们要回去了。如果猎物落到你手里，却连挣扎都不会挣扎，那还算什么狩猎？我太失望了！”{n}卡里戈斯脸上闪过了挑衅的笑容。{/n}“还有，别以为我会忘了你的话和你的承诺，{name}。这些事情咱们下次见面再说。”

languages.text: « Sur ce, nous allons repartir. Ce n'est pas une vraie chasse quand la proie ne se débat même pas une fois qu'on l'a attrapée. Quelle déception ! Au fait, n'allez pas croire que je vais oublier ce que vous avez dit et promis, {name}, {n}continue Calligos avec un sourire provocateur.{/n} Nous y reviendrons plus tard... »
languages.original_text: "We shall be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We shall revisit that later."

traits.locale_text: « Sur ce, nous allons repartir. Ce n'est pas une vraie chasse quand la proie ne se débat même pas une fois qu'on l'a attrapée. Quelle déception ! Au fait, n'allez pas croire que je vais oublier ce que vous avez dit et promis, {name}, {n}continue Calligos avec un sourire provocateur.{/n} Nous en reparlerons. »

languages.text: 「我々は帰るとする。掴んでももがかない獲物など、狩りにもならん。ガッカリだ！」{n}カリゴスは挑発的な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「お前の言葉や約束を俺が忘れると思うなよ、{name}。また後で話そう」
languages.original_text: "We shall be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We shall revisit that later."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は帰るとする。掴んでももがかない獲物など、狩りにもならん。ガッカリだ！」{n}カリゴスは挑発的な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「お前の言葉や約束を俺が忘れると思うなよ、{name}。後でまた話そう」

languages.text: "Wir drehen jetzt um. Was ist das für eine Jagd, wenn die Beute nicht einmal in unserem Griff zappelt und sich wehrt? Ich bin enttäuscht!" {n}Calligos grinst provokant.{/n} "Und glaubt ja nicht, dass ich Eure Worte und Versprechen vergessen würde, {name}. Wir kommen später darauf zurück."
languages.original_text: "We shall be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We shall revisit that later."

traits.locale_text: "Wir drehen jetzt um. Was ist das für eine Jagd, wenn die Beute nicht einmal in unserem Griff zappelt und sich wehrt? Ich bin enttäuscht!" {n}Calligos grinst provokant.{/n} "Und glaubt ja nicht, dass ich Eure Worte und Versprechen vergessen würde, {name}. Wir kommen später darauf zurück."

languages.text: "Artık geri dönebiliriz. Avının böyle elinin altında debelenmediği av mı olur? Hayal kırıklığına uğradım!" {n}Calligos, sinir bozucu bir şekilde sırıtıyor.{/n} "Söylediklerini ve verdiğin sözleri unutacağımı da sanma sakın {name}. Bu hususa sonra tekrar değineceğiz."
languages.original_text: "We shall be heading back now. What kind of hunting is it when the prey does not even struggle in your grasp? I'm disappointed!" {n}Calligos flashes a provoking grin.{/n} "And don't you think I am going to forget about your words and promises, {name}. We shall revisit that later."

traits.locale_text: "Artık geri dönebiliriz. Avının böyle elinin altında debelenmediği av mı olur? Hayal kırıklığına uğradım!" {n}Calligos, sinir bozucu bir şekilde sırıtıyor.{/n} "Söylediklerini ve verdiğin sözleri unutacağımı da sanma sakın {name}. Bu hususa sonra tekrar değineceğiz."
